_readme: Patterns learned from experience - what works and what doesn't

learnings.pattern: 3-tier date fallback strategy for Freshdesk sync achieves 98.7% accuracy: (1) custom field cf_injury_date, (2) text extraction from subject/description, (3) fallback to created_at timestamp
learnings.source: Session 2026-01-05, date quality analysis across 160 cases

learnings.pattern: Automatic retry logic with exponential backoff prevents sync failures: 3 attempts with 60-second delay handles transient network issues and API rate limits
